differStatesOfNoteBlockForFacade.#Comment: If different textures in resource packs are used for different instruments and notes, or whether powered, please set this [true]

renderLaserBeams.#Comment: When false laser beams will not be visible while transmitting power without wearing Goggles

facadeBlockIdFilter.#Comment: The block id(ResourceLocation) filter for blocks to create facades to display in CreativeModTab. Id filter has higher priority than namespace filter. [Warn: blocks allowed here may be disallowed by in-code rules.] [stone, oak_planks and oak_log are forced enabled.] Example value: minecraft:dirt

facadeBlockNamespaceFilter.#Comment: The block namespace filter for blocks to create facades to display in CreativeModTab. Namespace filter has lower priority than id filter. [Warn: blocks allowed here may be disallowed by in-code rules.] Example value: minecraft

facadesNotInCreativeModTabCanBeCrafted.#Comment: Whether facades not in the facade tab can be crafted by facade assembly recipes
